Good morning and greetings from Mazars!

We are interested in participating in your Annual Supplier due diligence, but have realised that there are not attachments available on the sourcing platform. Could you be of help?

Good morning and warm greetings from Mazars,

We are writing to express our keen interest in participating in your Annual Supplier due diligence process. We have thoroughly reviewed the information provided on the sourcing platform and noticed that there are no attachments available for our perusal. As such, we kindly request your assistance in obtaining the requisite attachments necessary for us to complete the due diligence process in a timely and efficient manner.

We understand the importance of supplier due diligence in ensuring compliance and mitigating risks, and we are committed to providing all necessary information and documentation required to demonstrate our suitability as a supplier. We would greatly appreciate any assistance you could offer in this regard.

Thank you for your attention to this matter, and we look forward to the opportunity to collaborate with you in the near future.

Best regards,

[Your name]
Mazars
